metadata.title: CVE-2016-2087 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in the client in HexChat 2.11.0 allowsremote IRC servers to read or modify arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) inthe server name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hexchat - 2.12.4-4
hexchat-common - 2.12.4-4
hexchat-lua - 2.12.4-4
hexchat-perl - 2.12.4-4
hexchat-plugins - 2.12.4-4
hexchat-python3 - 2.12.4-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hexchat package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.4-4').
